summary: Implements a NeMo model that provides an end‑to‑end pipeline for converting natural‑language questions into SPARQL queries. It configures tokenizers, loads the Text2Sparql dataset, builds a transformer encoder‑decoder (e.g., BART), and defines training, validation, and testing logic with metrics such as perplexity, orchestrated via PyTorch Lightning.
business_intent: Enable developers to train and deploy models that automatically translate user utterances into SPARQL queries for querying knowledge graphs, facilitating natural‑language interfaces to structured data.
